actor_awards.notes: A personal favorite of Alfred Hitchcock who signed her to a personal contract.

filmography.title: The Rose Bowl Story
filmography.role_description: A Rose Tournament Princess who falls for a brash football player in this romantic drama.
filmography.plot: A self-centered quarterback falls for a Rose Princess and learns the value of teamwork.

filmography.title: The Beast from 20,000 Fathoms
filmography.role_description: Miles appeared in the promotional material for this seminal monster movie, marking an early studio connection.
filmography.plot: A ferocious dinosaur awakened by an Arctic atomic test terrorizes the North Atlantic and ultimately New York City.

filmography.title: The Charge at Feather River
filmography.role_description: A woman captured by Native Americans whose rescue is the central mission of the film.
filmography.plot: A man is recruited to rescue two white women held captive by the Cheyenne and lead a railroad party to safety.

filmography.title: Tarzan's Hidden Jungle
filmography.role_description: A nurse who stumbles into danger in the jungle; met her future husband Gordon Scott (Tarzan) on set.
filmography.plot: Tarzan tangles with two white hunters who disguise themselves as a photographer and a doctor.

filmography.title: Wichita
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a banker who falls for the new marshal, Wyatt Earp.
filmography.plot: Wyatt Earp agrees to become the marshal of lawless Wichita, Kansas, but his strict enforcement of the law angers the town leaders.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win - Best Outdoor Drama

filmography.title: The Searchers
filmography.role_description: A spirited frontier woman who waits years for the man she loves while he searches for his abducted niece.
filmography.plot: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.

filmography.title: 23 Paces to Baker Street
filmography.role_description: The loyal ex-fiancée of a blind playwright who helps him investigate a kidnapping plot he overheard.
filmography.plot: A blind writer overhears a kidnapping plot in a London pub and must track down the criminals with the help of his assistant.

filmography.title: Autumn Leaves
filmography.role_description: The manipulative ex-wife of a younger man who marries an older woman, causing emotional turmoil.
filmography.plot: A middle-aged typist marries a younger man, but his mental instability and the arrival of his ex-wife threaten their marriage.

filmography.title: The Wrong Man
filmography.role_description: The fragile wife of a man falsely accused of robbery, whose mental health deteriorates under the stress.
filmography.plot: In 1953, an innocent man is mistaken for an armed robber and caught up in the criminal justice system with spiraling consequences.

filmography.title: Beau James
filmography.role_description: The showgirl mistress and eventual wife of the flamboyant New York Mayor Jimmy Walker.
filmography.plot: The life and times of Jimmy Walker, the popular but scandalous mayor of New York City in the 1920s.

filmography.title: The FBI Story
filmography.role_description: The dedicated wife of an FBI agent, spanning several decades of American history and bureau cases.
filmography.plot: A dedicated FBI agent recalls the history of the bureau as he faces various threats to national security.

filmography.title: A Touch of Larceny
filmography.role_description: An American woman in London who becomes the object of affection for a suave British officer planning a clever scheme.
filmography.plot: A British officer hatches a plot to sell military secrets to the Soviets—or appear to—in order to sue newspapers for libel.

filmography.title: 5 Branded Women
filmography.role_description: One of five Yugoslavian women who are shaved and banished for associating with a German sergeant, then join the partisans.
filmography.plot: Five women accused of consorting with the Nazis are cast out of their village and join the resistance movement.

filmography.title: Psycho
filmography.role_description: The determined sister of a missing woman who investigates the Bates Motel and uncovers its horrifying secret.
filmography.plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

filmography.title: Back Street
filmography.role_description: The alcoholic and unstable wife of a man who is in love with another woman in this melodramatic remake.
filmography.plot: A career woman carries on a long-term affair with a married man, sacrificing her own happiness for his love.

filmography.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
filmography.role_description: A strong frontier woman torn between a rugged rancher and an idealistic lawyer who brings law to the West.
filmography.plot: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

filmography.title: Those Calloways
filmography.role_description: The supportive wife of an eccentric woodsman who dreams of creating a sanctuary for wild geese.
filmography.plot: A man and his family live in the Vermont backwoods and fight to establish a sanctuary for migrating geese.

filmography.title: Follow Me, Boys!
filmography.role_description: A local woman who marries a traveling musician who decides to settle down and become a scoutmaster.
filmography.plot: A musician settles in a small town and dedicates his life to the local Boy Scout troop.

filmography.title: The Spirit Is Willing
filmography.role_description: A wife and mother who deals with ghosts in a New England summer house in this horror-comedy.
filmography.plot: A couple and their son rent a haunted house by the sea, leading to supernatural hijinks.

filmography.title: Gentle Giant
filmography.role_description: The mother of a young boy who befriends a bear cub; the film that inspired the 'Gentle Ben' TV series.
filmography.plot: A young boy befriends a black bear cub and raises it, despite the concerns of his parents and the community.

filmography.title: Sergeant Ryker
filmography.role_description: The wife of a soldier accused of treason, whose trial uncovers complex layers of deception.
filmography.plot: A U.S. soldier is sentenced to death for defecting to the Chinese during the Korean War but claims he was on a secret mission.

filmography.title: Hellfighters
filmography.role_description: The estranged wife of a globetrotting oil well firefighter, played by John Wayne.
filmography.plot: The adventures of oil well firefighter Chance Buckman, based on the life of Red Adair.

filmography.title: The Wild Country
filmography.role_description: A mother who moves her family from Pittsburgh to Wyoming to homestead a ranch, facing harsh conditions.
filmography.plot: A family moves west to take over a ranch but faces drought, tornadoes, and hostile neighbors.

filmography.title: Molly and Lawless John
filmography.role_description: A sheriff's wife who falls for a prisoner and helps him escape, only to be betrayed.
filmography.plot: The wife of a sheriff falls in love with a prisoner and helps him escape, embarking on a journey that tests her strength.

filmography.title: The Castaway Cowboy
filmography.role_description: A widow struggling to run a potato farm in Hawaii who gets help from a shipwrecked cowboy.
filmography.plot: A Texas cowboy gets shanghaied and jumps ship in Hawaii, where he helps a widow turn her farm into a cattle ranch.

filmography.title: Psycho II
filmography.role_description: Reprising her role as Lila Crane, now married and seeking to keep Norman Bates institutionalized.
filmography.plot: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a normal life, but is haunted by his past.

filmography.title: Into the Night
filmography.role_description: A supporting role in this dark comedy thriller starring Jeff Goldblum and Michelle Pfeiffer.
filmography.plot: An insomniac discovers his wife is having an affair and wanders into a dangerous adventure with a beautiful smuggler.
